attributes.action: Allow children to go to any school that they want to whether or not the school is in their catchment area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my sisters were recently turned away from going to a secondary school which they wanted to go to because they weren't in the 'catchment area' for that school and instead they had to go to the school in our area, which is the worst school i have ever seen in my life. the teachers don't control the students, there a students that smoke cannabis. i dont want my little sisters in with that sort of school
